name: whitespacepp
description: Customize characters and colors of whitespaces

whitespacepp.renderTAB.description: Check here to render TAB (\t) characters.

whitespacepp.renderWS.description: Check here to render Wide Space characters.

whitespacepp.renderLF.description: Check here to render Line Feed (\n) character.

whitespacepp.renderEOF.description: Check here to render [EOF] marker at the end of the file.

whitespacepp.textTAB.description: Text for TAB (\t). It's recommended that you specify 1em size characters, and you can also specify Unicode characters such as "Ôø´", "‚Ä£", "‚ñ∏", "‚ñπ", "‚ùØ".

whitespacepp.textWS.description: Text for Wide Space. It's recommended that you specify 2em size characters, and you can also specify Unicode characters such as "‚ñ¢", "‚óå", "‚ñ®", "‚ñí", "üî≤".

whitespacepp.textLF.description: Text for Line Feed (\n). You can also specify Unicode characters such as "‚Ü©", "‚óÇ", "‚ñæ".

whitespacepp.textEOF.description: Text for EOF (End of File). You can also specify Unicode characters.

whitespacepp.foreColorEOF.description: Text color for EOF (End of File).

whitespacepp.changeBackColorTAB.description: Check here to change background color for TAB (\t).

whitespacepp.changeBackColorWS.description: Check here to change background color for Wide Space.

whitespacepp.changeBackColorLF.description: Check here to change background color for Line Feed (\n).

whitespacepp.changeBackColorEOF.description: Check here to change background color for EOF (End of File).

whitespacepp.backColorEOF.description: Background color for EOF (End of File).

whitespacepp.renderingDelayMs.description: Rendering delay time in millisecond. Drawing requests with intervals shorter than the delay time will be canceled.
